Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Unified AI Council VS Code Extension v0.1.0

Features:
- Council orchestration with 3 AI CLIs \(Codex, Claude, Gemini\)
- WSL-based CLI execution for cross-platform support
- Multiple council modes \(plan, code, review, ask, refactor\)
- JSONL-based project memory persistence
- Optional Ollama local model synthesis
- Security-first command validation with allowlist
- Webview panel with CSP nonce protection
EOF
\)")
